#include"iostream"
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int high = 0;
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	int * arr = new int [n];
//	int ** hash = new int * [n];

	int ctr = 0;
	for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++ )
		cin>>arr[i];

	high = arr[0];

	for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++ )
	{
		if ( arr[i] > high )
			high = arr[i];
		else
		{
			for ( int j = 0; j < i ; j++)
			{
				if(arr[j]>arr[i])
					ctr++;
			}

		}
	}

	cout<<ctr;
	return 0;



}
